divs: Sighting Detailswe were at EPCOT center waitnig for the fire works, as i look to the distant sky i saw what appears to be an aircraft with the normal contrail following it, but soon the contrail stop and the object continue moving our way, as i was telling my sister and the rest of the family that normally contrail don't just stop from an aircraft unless it's low to the ground, about this time three lights were released from the bright light, i snapped a couple of pictures, also it appears that another set of triangular lights were released, as i tried to get another picture the object disappeared as if some one turn off the light. we felt that maybe this was part of the show but the light was so far out of the area that i don't believe Disney had anything to do with it.
Summary: bright light releasing 3 triangle shape lights, all the light s vanished
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Kissimmee
There was one other sighting in Kissimmee on or around May 24th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
